item.title: 韩国取消提高股票资本利得税的计划
item.description: 韩国放弃了一项有争议的降低股票投资者资本利得税起征点的计划，这将是李在明总统自今年 6 月上任以来的首次重大政策逆转。【原文：South Korea has abandoned a controversial plan to lower the capital gains tax threshold for stock investors, in what would be President Lee Jae Myung’s first major policy reversal since taking office in June.】

item.title: 通胀袭来，英国食品集团寻求减轻监管负担
item.description: 据一个代表食品行业的组织称，由于制造商正在努力应对 "政府政策带来的财政负担"，英国的食品通胀率预计将加快至去年年初以来的最快速度。【原文：Food inflation in the UK is expected to accelerate to the fastest pace since the start of last year as manufacturers struggle with the “financial burden of government policies,” according to a group that represents the industry.】

item.title: 菲律宾人沉迷于在线赌博。政府也是如此
item.description:
该国的公共卫生危机为正在考虑开放廉价网上博彩的其他发展中国家敲响了警钟。【原文：

The country’s public health crisis serves as a warning to other developing nations that are considering opening up to cheap online betting.

】

item.title: 债务风险上升，韩国敦促石化行业采取行动
item.description: 一家大型企业濒临破产已成为韩国陷入困境的石化行业的导火索，加剧了人们对企业债务的担忧，并促使政府呼吁进行重组，同时暗示必要时可能进行干预。【原文：A near-default by a major player has become a flashpoint for South Korea’s struggling petrochemical industry, intensifying concerns over corporate debt and prompting government calls for restructuring — with hints of possible intervention, if needed.】

item.title: 美元持稳，交易员将焦点转向美联储会议：市场综述
item.description: 随着中美贸易谈判进入第二天，美元在亚洲早盘交易中持稳，投资者关注本周美联储的政策决定。【原文：The dollar was steady in early Asian trading as US-China trade talks entered a second day, with investors focused on this week’s Federal Reserve policy decision.】

item.title: 大卫-埃里森希望打破好莱坞的合并魔咒
item.description:
这位亿万富翁电影制片人已经收购了派拉蒙公司。现在，他希望将派拉蒙与另一家历史悠久的好莱坞制片厂合并。【原文：

The billionaire movie producer has already acquired Paramount. Now he wants to combine it with another storied Hollywood studio.

】

item.title: 台湾保险公司或将加强外汇对冲以保护海外资产
item.description: 台湾的人寿保险公司看来将从接近历史最低点的水平提高货币对冲，试图保护海外资产免受本币进一步波动的影响。【原文：Taiwan’s life insurers look set to lift their currency hedging from near record lows in an attempt to shield overseas assets from further swings in the local dollar.】

item.title: 2,000 亿美元热潮中的雷曼倒闭带来的复合型投注抨击
item.description:
危机过去将近二十年后，美国富人终于再次学会热爱结构性产品。【原文：

Almost two decades after the crisis, wealthy Americans are finally learning to love structured products again.

】

item.title: 阿尔及利亚在内阁改组中任命新任能源部长
item.description: 阿尔及利亚任命国营电力和天然气公用事业公司 Sonelgaz 的负责人穆拉德-阿贾尔（Mourad Adjal）为新任能源部长，这是阿尔及利亚总统阿卜杜勒-马吉德-特布恩（Abdelmadjid Tebboune）一年前重新当选以来的首次内阁改组。【原文：Algeria appointed Mourad Adjal, head of state-run electricity and gas utility Sonelgaz, as the new energy minister in the first cabinet reshuffle since President Abdelmadjid Tebboune’s reelection a year earlier.】

item.title: 市场为美联储一系列缩表做准备，看涨押注面临风险
item.description: 本周投资者面临的一个关键问题是，美联储官员是否会回击市场对一系列降息措施将延续到明年的押注。【原文：A key question for investors this week is whether Federal Reserve officials push back against market bets on a series of interest-rate cuts extending into next year.】

item.title: 债券投资者将关注美联储的政策路径和鲍威尔的态度
item.description: 债券投资者将关注本周的美联储会议，预计决策者将在会上宣布降息四分之一个百分点。【原文：Bond investors will be focused on this week’s Federal Reserve meeting, where policymakers are expected to deliver a quarter-point rate cut.】

item.title: 贸易共和国联手阿波罗和 EQT 推进私募市场发展
item.description: 由前美林银行家 Christian Hecker 共同创办的德国在线经纪商 Trade Republic 正在与阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）和 EQT 合作，为客户提供进入私人市场的机会。【原文：Trade Republic, the German online broker co-founded by ex-Merrill Lynch banker Christian Hecker, is teaming up with Apollo Global Management and EQT to offer clients access to private markets, a growing corner of finance that’s capturing the attention of retail investors.】

item.title: 塞恩斯伯里结束与 JD.com 关于出售 Argos 部门的谈判
item.description: 英国第二大杂货商 J Sainsbury Plc 已终止与中国电子商务公司京东商城（JD.com Inc.【原文：Britain’s second-largest grocer J Sainsbury Plc has terminated talks with Chinese e-commerce firm JD.com Inc. to sell its general merchandise unit Argos.】

item.title: 期权交易者渴望波动性 超越美联储看就业数据
item.description: 尽管美联储会议和 5 万亿美元的季度三倍期权到期的阴影笼罩着股市，但波动率交易员们也在日历上盘旋着即将到来的就业数据。【原文：Even as the Federal Reserve meeting and $5 trillion quarterly triple-witching options expiry loom over the equity market, volatility traders are also circling the upcoming jobs data on their calendars.】

item.title: 朝鲜黑客利用 ChatGPT 帮助伪造 Deepfake ID
item.description: 据网络安全研究人员称，一个疑似朝鲜国家支持的黑客组织利用 ChatGPT 创建了一个深度伪造的军人身份证件，以攻击韩国的一个目标。【原文：A suspected North Korean state-sponsored hacking group used ChatGPT to create a deepfake of a military ID document to attack a target in South Korea, according to cybersecurity researchers.】

item.title: 关税的不确定性造成伤害。调查显示，支付关税更糟糕
item.description: 美国进口商几个月来一直在纠结，是囤积货物以应对唐纳德-特朗普总统的全球关税威胁，还是坐以待毙，希望他是在虚张声势。随着大范围关税实施近一个月，支付关税的痛苦正在取代不确定性带来的沮丧。【原文：US importers spent months wondering whether to stockpile to survive President Donald Trump’s global tariff threats, or sit tight hoping he was bluffing. With widespread duties now having been in place for almost a month, the pain of paying them is replacing the frustration of uncertainty.】

item.title: 美联储辩论在特朗普重压下转向削减步伐
item.description: 美联储准备在九个月内首次恢复降息，以应对劳动力市场放缓、通胀顽固以及唐纳德-特朗普总统史无前例地推动降低借贷成本等问题。【原文：The Federal Reserve is poised to resume cutting interest rates for the first time in nine months as it grapples with a slowing labor market, stubborn inflation and an unprecedented push by President Donald Trump for lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 柯克遇害后，犹他州州长抨击 "邪恶 "的社交媒体
item.description: 犹他州州长斯宾塞-考克斯（Spencer Cox）指责社交媒体公司帮助煽动分裂，导致保守派活动家查理-柯克（Charlie Kirk）遇害，称这些公司是 "冲突企业家"，从政治极化中获利。【原文：Utah Governor Spencer Cox blamed social-media companies for helping foment divisiveness that led to the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, calling them “conflict entrepreneurs” that profit from political polarization.】

item.title: 新兴市场动态：人民币升值或将提振新兴市场外汇市场（播客）
item.description: 新加坡的 Marcus Wong 与孟买的 Malavika Kaur Makol 共同探讨了人民币逐步升值可能会如何重新加速发展中市场货币的反弹。【原文：Marcus Wong in Singapore joins Malavika Kaur Makol in Mumbai to discuss how the yuan’s gradual appreciation may re-accelerate a rally in currencies from developing markets.】

item.title: 乔尼-艾维离职六年后，苹果提出回归设计本源
item.description: 在 iPhone 17 的主题演讲中，苹果公司花了大量篇幅宣传自己仍然深深植根于设计。此外：新款 iPhone 发布后的下一步计划；公司为 2000 美元机型做好准备；iPhone Air 在中国的发布推迟。最后：苹果公司又一重大人工智能离职事件。【原文：Apple spent much of its iPhone 17 keynote presentation pitching the message that it’s still deeply rooted in design. Also: Here’s what’s next after the new iPhones; the company prepares customers for $2,000 models; and the launch of the iPhone Air in China is delayed. Lastly: Another major AI exit at Apple.】

item.title: 美国官员对扣留韩国人表示遗憾
item.description: 美国副国务卿克里斯托弗-兰道（Christopher Landau）周日对最近数百名韩国工人在格鲁吉亚被拘留一事表示遗憾。【原文：US Deputy Secretary of State Christopher Landau on Sunday expressed regret over the recent detention of hundreds of South Korean workers in Georgia.】

item.title: 人民币逐步走高或将提振新兴货币
item.description: 随着投资者为美国降低利率做好准备，中国对人民币稳步升值的新容忍度似乎将重新加速新兴市场货币的反弹。【原文：China’s new-found tolerance for steady yuan appreciation looks set to re-accelerate a rally in emerging-market currencies, as investors brace themselves for lower US interest rates.】

item.title: 伊朗警告制裁将破坏与联合国原子能监察机构的关系
item.description: 伊朗最高安全机构警告说，欧洲威胁恢复联合国对伊朗的制裁可能会阻碍恢复对伊朗核设施进行国际检查的努力。【原文：Iran’s top security body warned that European threats to reinstate UN sanctions on the country could hinder efforts to restore international inspections at Iranian nuclear facilities.】

item.title: 瑞银与美国官员会面，权衡战略选择：纽约邮报
item.description: 据《纽约邮报》周日报道，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）高管最近会见了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府的官员，他们正在评估一项潜在的战略转变，以帮助这家瑞士银行应对国内更严格的资本要求。【原文：UBS Group AG executives recently met with officials from President Donald Trump’s administration as they evaluate a potential strategy shift that could help the Swiss bank combat stiffer capital requirements at home, the New York Post reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 越南力争到 2030 年达到 MSCI 市场升级标准
item.description: 越南政府网站发表声明称，越南的目标是到 2030 年达到 MSCI 新兴市场升级标准，同时努力吸引更多外国投资者。【原文：Vietnam targets to meet MSCI’s emerging market upgrade criteria by 2030 as it pushes forward with efforts to appeal to more foreign investors, according to a statement on the government website.】

item.title: 无人机袭击俄罗斯主要出口型炼油厂
item.description: 由于基辅不断向俄罗斯能源和工业设施施压，位于列宁格勒地区的基里希炼油厂（又称 Kinef）一夜之间遭到乌克兰无人机的袭击。【原文：The Kirishi oil refinery, known as Kinef, in the Leningrad region was attacked by Ukrainian drones overnight as Kyiv keeps up the pressure on Russian energy and industrial facilities.】

item.title: 位于欧洲中心的欧盟国家认为中立是发挥外交作用的关键
item.description: 奥地利希望成为全球外交中更强大的力量和解决冲突的枢纽。外交部长贝亚特-迈尔-莱辛格（Beate Meinl-Reisinger）认为，这些努力的关键在于坚持数十年来的军事中立，尽管在奥地利周边地区战火纷飞。【原文：Austria hopes to become a stronger force in global diplomacy and a hub for conflict resolution. Key to those efforts, according to Foreign Minister Beate Meinl-Reisinger, is sticking to decades-old military neutrality despite a raging war in the nation’s proximity.】

item.title: 泰克公司创始人寻求与英格洛公司合并，但为时已晚
item.description: 两年前，当嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）主动提出以 230 亿美元收购泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）时，这家加拿大矿业公司的创始人果断地拒绝了这一想法。"小诺曼-基维尔当时说："现在还不是时候。【原文：Two years ago, when Glencore Plc proposed an unsolicited, $23 billion takeover of Teck Resources Ltd., the Canadian miner’s founder decisively rejected the idea. “Now is not the time,” Norman Keevil Jr. said back then.】

item.title: 瑞士中央银行学会与强势法郎共存
item.description: 瑞士国家银行似乎对如何应对法郎走强有了新的理论：选择你的战斗。【原文：The Swiss National Bank seems to have a new doctrine on how to handle the strength of the franc: pick your battles.】

item.title: 帕萨利德斯称跨境银行整合有利于塞浦路斯
item.description: 塞浦路斯中央银行行长表示，欧洲大型贷款机构之间的跨国兼并有助于加强塞浦路斯的金融体系。【原文：Cross-border mergers among large European lenders can help strengthen the Cypriot financial system, according to the country’s central-bank chief.】
